title: The New Beginning
content:
The New Beginning is the seventh and last manuscript of the @[The True Historical Documents of Hesli](item:6a31bfd0-6dc9-4d08-9595-13b20497c03d) which contains the true written history of Hesli. It describes the events after the war and tells of a prophecy written in @[Scroll of Return](document:1c10fa6c-a8bb-4f3d-978e-bfa9db3d82e8). It urges the reader to find it at @[Stronghold Geisl](landmark:22e645bf-ca3e-41ab-8bbc-21d807ac84cb) to prepare for what is to come. The contents have been encrypted using the @[Nannan Sauriv](language:90f0274c-4d56-46d4-ade9-693ee54f08ad) cipher.

[h1]The True Historical Documents of Hesli[/h1]
This collection contains the true history written by several authors that the dwarves, elves, and gnome hid away for no one to find. There are multiple documents part of this collection:
[ol]
[li]@[The Day of the Rising Sun](document:85f3db24-79e1-4f8f-8b24-dbbd2d601d28)[/li]
[li]@[The Night of the Setting Moon](document:934ef499-2aec-4b69-971b-7915b5c3f88f)[/li]
[li]@[The Year of Collaboration](document:67250d06-1f3a-42d0-9d8b-85df8a0651c5)[/li]
[li]@[The Disappearance of Luna](document:a3cdcf39-14f0-4199-9b59-a2970be40de5)[/li]
[li]@[The Disciples of Chaos](document:60d72ac6-27fd-41e4-96a7-f6dec1dd0651)[/li]
[li]@[The Draconic War](document:59bb8ea4-4e1f-4d47-9d3b-6761de8ac899)[/li]
[li][b]@[The New Beginning](document:2ab4dbb3-c6f2-4582-98d0-73fec001d92a)[/b][/li]
[/ol]
contents:
[quote][h1]The New Beginning[/h1]
The war is over. Few of us are left, but enough to get things back up to speed or so we hope. The Disciples of Chaos have run back through whatever hellhole they came through. We must aid the Dvares, Geenoms, and Aileves for we must help one another. Hopefully, we can make the world bloom again.

Birgor also returned from his travels. He looks weary, scuffed... tired. His face tells all; he has seen much over the past years and battles have left scars all over him both on the in and outside. He has told us about his travels for Luna. But the news is grave, he couldn't find her. However, he did find a scroll in her stronghold, Geisl. The scroll told some prophecy, possibly written by Luna herself just before her abduction. According to Birgor, the scroll was written with much haste. Still, the message was clear.

In the future, they will come back. We assume she's talking about the Disciples of Chaos. However, she also tells about a group of brave. They will be the true heroes of the world. They must be aided, no matter what. Birgor advised us to spread the word already. No one knows how long it will take for this event to take place. It could be hundred year, even thousands of years. We must prepare everyone for it now, make it known that there will be a someone that takes up arms and free Luna; that fights the darkness.

We will follow Birgor's advice. I will sent out a few followers to spread the word in the world, and instruct a few scribes to document everything. These documents the followers can take with them. Meanwhile, I'll instruct the warriors to help with the cleanup and make sure the other species will learn more survival strategies, technologies, medicine, whatever is needed to keep them alive. With Birgor, I'll discuss how we can ensure that we stay alive too. We might be needed in that dire future...
[/quote]
